title: tHe rIcH aReN’t eViL, Standard 3-Day Weekends? 3.16.21
itunes:title: tHe rIcH aReN’t eViL, Standard 3-Day Weekends? 3.16.21
description:
In episode 832, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Kenny DeForest to discuss Oscar nominations, Biden's tax plan, the Buzzfeed food quiz, the Oreo x NBA Dynasry collab, Spain testing our a four day work week, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Number of movies released in the United States and Canada from 1980 to 2017
  2. Number of movies released in the United States and Canada from 2000 to 2020
  3. The 20 Best Documentaries of 2015
  4. BEST OF 2015: FILM CRITIC TOP TEN LISTS
  5. Oscar nominations 2021: See the full list of nominees
  6. Biden Eyes First Major Tax Hike Since 1993 in Next Economic Plan
  7. Here Are 60 Foods — Tell Us What You Like And We'll Guess Your Age
  8. The NBA Is Partnering with Oreos and We're Getting Team Logo Cookies
  9. Spain to launch trial of four-day working week
  10. Economics of a four-day working week: Research shows it can save businesses money
  11. The 4-Day Workweek: Has Its Time Come?
  12. The case for a 4-day workweek
  13. Bill would create 32-hour workweek in Washington
  14. Where the Five-Day Workweek Came From
  15. Henry Ford started the 40-hour workweek but the reason will surprise you
  16. The "40-Hour" Workweek Is Actually Longer -- by Seven Hours
  17. New Report Confirms Just How Shitty US Workers Have It
  18. WATCH: Mono/Poly - Ra Rise
